John Pearce (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Pearce_(actor) 0 John Pearce (November 27, 1927 - April 29, 2000) was an American theater, television and film actor, as well as occasional stuntman. John_Pearce ( November_27_,_1927 - April_29_,_2000 ) was an_American_theater_,_television_and_film_actor , as_well_as occasional_stuntman .
